Pre-Game Insights: The St. Louis Cardinals are 69-69 on the year.
The Milwaukee Brewers are 81-57 on the year.
The St. Louis Cardinals have scored 23 runs in their last 3 games and 4 or more runs in 6 of their last 8 games.
The Milwaukee Brewers have scored 17 runs in their last 3 games and 4 or more runs in 7 of their last 8 games.
The St. Louis Cardinals have won 4 straight games when scoring 4 or more runs.
The Milwaukee Brewers have won 6 straight games when scoring 4 or more runs.
Steven Matz is 1-2 with a 6.18 ERA and 17 strikeouts this season.
Aaron Civale is 5-8 with a 4.59 ERA and 127 strikeouts this season.
The Brewers have won each of their last eight home games after playing the previous day.
The Cardinals have lost eight of their last nine road games against National League opponents.
The Brewers have covered the run line in seven of their last eight home games after playing the previous day.
The Cardinals have failed to cover the run line in each of their last five road games against National League opponents.
The Cardinals have trailed after 5 innings in each of their last seven road games against National League opponents.
The Cardinals have trailed after 3 innings in each of their last five night games against opponents that held a winning record.
